en-US.summary: Guess which animal made the sound that plays
examplePhrases: Alexa open guess the animal sound
en-US.name: Guess the animal sound
en-US.description:
Alexa will play an animal sound and you have to guess which animal made it. 

Lot's of fun for kids to try naming which animal made each sound. Lot's of animals included like bears, cats, dogs, lions and more.  

Feedback and suggestions are welcome at digitallyuncommon@gmail.com. If you would like more sounds added send me an email. Checkout https://digitallyuncommon.com to get notified about other Alexa skills and updates.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Launch: Alexa open guess the animal sound. Instructions. Alexa will play an animal sound. You must guess which animal made the sound. After 5 tries Alexa will prompt the user to see if they want to keep playing or not. Animal sounds included are bear, bird, cat,chicken, crow, dog, elephant, horse, lion, monkey, rat, raven, rooster, sheep, turkey and wolf
